description:
One by one, the Straw Hats are crushed to learn the tragic fate of Fire Fist Ace. Despite their own unique problems, the crew members` thoughts immediately turn to their crestfallen captain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`équipage de Chapeau de Paille sous le choc ! De mauvaises nouvelles !
Mugiwara no Ichimi Gekishin! Motarasareta Kyouhou
Straw Hats in Shock! The Bad News Has Reached Them!
Потрясённые пираты Соломенной шляпы! Дурные новости получены!
麦わらの一味激震! もたらされた凶報
